artist: Designer: Siegfried Wagner; Manufacturer: Mogens Ballin Workshop
creditline: The Eloise and Elliot Kaplan Endowment for Judaica
description: Art Nouveau style, Danish inscription: "To the Society for the Care of the Sick"
markings: on bottom of stopper, incised: [M B]
object_name: Tzedakah box for the Copenhagen Society for the  Care of the Sick
text: Approximately 60 of these boxes were commissioned by the Tiferes Jedidim or Society for the Care of the Sick.  The box exhibits the influence of German Art Nouveau, also known as Jugendstil, reflecting the design aesthetic of its day, a relatively rare phenomenon in early 20th century Judaica.
title: Tzedakah box for the Copenhagen Society for the Care of the Sick
